data.eml:eml: Copepods of the family Dirivultidae (Siphonostomatoida) from deep­sea hydrothermal vent fields on the Mid­Atlantic Ridge at 14 ºN and 5 ºS

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Ivanenko, Viatcheslav N., Arbizu, Pedro Martínez, Stecher, Jens (2006): Copepods of the family Dirivultidae (Siphonostomatoida) from deep­sea hydrothermal vent fields on the Mid­Atlantic Ridge at 14 ºN and 5 ºS. Zootaxa 1277: 1-21, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.173351
